BirdInfo:
Order is: TINAMIFORMES Family is: TINAMIDAE Great Tinamou. Tinamus major Highland Tinamou. Nothocercus Little Tinamou. Crypturellus soui Thicket Tinamou. Crypturellus cinnamomeus Slaty-breasted Tinamou. Crypturellus boucardi Choco Tinamou. Crypturellus kerriae
Order is: GAVIIFORMES Family is: GAVIIDAE Red-throated Loon. Gavia stellata Arctic Loon. Gavia arctica Pacific Loon. Gavia pacifica Common Loon. Gavia immer Yellow-billed Loon. Gavia adamsii
Order is: PODICIPEDIFORMES Family is: PODICIPEDIDAE Least Grebe. Tachybaptus dominicus Pied-billed Grebe. Podilymbus podiceps Atitlan Grebe. Horned Grebe. Red-necked Grebe. Eared Grebe. Western Grebe. Clark's Grebe.
Order is: PROCELLARIIFORMES Family is: DIOMEDEIDAE Yellow-nosed Albatross. (A) Thalassarche chlororhynchos Shy Albatross. (A) Thalassarche cauta Black-browed Albatross. (A) Thalassarche melanophris Light-mantled Albatross. (A) Phoebetria palpebrata Wandering Albatross. (A) Diomedea exulans Laysan Albatross. Phoebastria immutabilis Black-footed Albatross. Phoebastria nigripes Short-tailed Albatross. (N) Phoebastria albatrus
Family is: PROCELLARIIDAE Northern Fulmar. Fulmarus glacialis Kermadec Petrel. (A) Pterodroma neglecta Herald Petrel. (A) Pterodroma arminjoniana Murphy's Petrel. (N) Pterodroma ultima Mottled Petrel. (A) Pterodroma inexpectata Bermuda Petrel. Pterodroma cahow Black-capped Petrel. Pterodroma hasitata Juan Fernandez Petrel. (N) Pterodroma externa Dark-rumped Petrel. Pterodroma phaeopygia White-necked Petrel. (H) Pterodroma cervicalis Bonin Petrel. (H) Pterodroma hypoleuca Black-winged Petrel. (H, A) Pterodroma nigripennis Cook's Petrel. (N) Pterodroma cookii Stejneger's Petrel. (A) Pterodroma longirostris Bulwer's Petrel. (H) Bulweria bulwerii Jouanin's Petrel. (H, A) Bulweria fallax Parkinson's Petrel. (N) Procellaria parkinsoni Streaked Shearwater. (A) Calonectris leucomelas Cory's Shearwater. (N) Calonectris diomedea Pink-footed Shearwater. (N) Puffinus creatopus Flesh-footed Shearwater. (N) Puffinus carneipes Greater Shearwater. (N) Puffinus gravis Wedge-tailed Shearwater. Puffinus pacificus Buller's Shearwater. (N) Puffinus bulleri Sooty Shearwater. (N) Puffinus griseus Short-tailed Shearwater. (N) Puffinus tenuirostris Christmas Shearwater. (H) Puffinus nativitatis Manx Shearwater. Puffinus puffinus Townsend's Shearwater. Puffinus auricularis Black-vented Shearwater. Puffinus opisthomelas Audubon's Shearwater. Puffinus lherminieri Little Shearwater. (A) Puffinus assimilis
Family is: HYDROBATIDAE Wilson's Storm-Petrel. (N) Oceanites oceanicus White-faced Storm-Petrel. (A) Pelagodroma marina European Storm-Petrel. (A) Hydrobates pelagicus Fork-tailed Storm-Petrel. Oceanodroma furcata Leach's Storm-Petrel. Oceanodroma leucorhoa Ashy Storm-Petrel. Oceanodroma homochroa Band-rumped Storm-Petrel. (N) Oceanodroma castro Wedge-rumped Storm-Petrel. (N) Oceanodroma tethys Black Storm-Petrel. Oceanodroma melania Guadalupe Storm-Petrel. Oceanodroma macrodactyla Markham's Storm-Petrel. (A) Oceanodroma markhami Tristram's Storm-Petrel. (H) Oceanodroma tristrami Least Storm-Petrel. Oceanodroma microsoma
Order is: PELECANIFORMES Family is: PHAETHONTIDAE White-tailed Tropicbird. Phaethon lepturus Red-billed Tropicbird. Phaethon aethereus Red-tailed Tropicbird. Phaethon rubricauda
Family is: SULIDAE Masked Booby. Sula dactylatra Blue-footed Booby. Sula nebouxii Peruvian Booby. (A) Sula variegata Brown Booby. Sula leucogaster Red-footed Booby. Sula sula Northern Gannet. Morus bassanus
Family is: PELECANIDAE American White Pelican. Pelecanus erythrorhynchos Brown Pelican. Pelecanus occidentalis
Family is: PHALACROCORACIDAE Brandt's Cormorant. Phalacrocorax penicillatus Neotropic Cormorant. Phalacrocorax brasilianus Double-crested Cormorant. Phalacrocorax auritus Great Cormorant. Phalacrocorax carbo Red-faced Cormorant. Phalacrocorax urile Pelagic Cormorant. Phalacrocorax pelagicus
Family is: ANHINGIDAE Anhinga. Anhinga anhinga
Family is: FREGATIDAE Magnificent Frigatebird. Fregata magnificens Great Frigatebird. Fregata minor Lesser Frigatebird. (A) Fregata ariel
